predicate.note: Frames file for 'daunt' based on sentences in wsj. No access to Verbnet at the moment.

example.name: almost always with NEG
example.text: Denver-based portfolio manager James Craig wasn't daunted [*-2] when Friday's rout shaved $40 million from the value of the $752 million Janus Fund he oversees.
example.arg: when Friday's rout shaved $40 million from the value of the $752 million Janus Fund he oversees
